Title: Unhappy

Title: Touch id issue
Review:
There is no option for previously registered device removal. Its very Helpfull if they provide in app or in site access to reset it. OR Other option so user can reset it counts. 

Mine is not working & its saying remove previously registered divide first. 
Overall app experience is way better then others.

Title: Wonderful User Experience
Review: I seriously do not understand why this app is underrated. It offers the best user experience one would want to have on an app. I am extremely happy with the app!!!

Title: Not able to access
Review:
It shows poor/ no connection, even when it is clearly connected to my wifi which is working perfectly well.
Please help!

Title: No support for Mutual Fund
Review:
We cannot start investing in Mutual fund online. You are forced to visit the bank. Bank representative is least interested in explaining Mutual Fund they will bombard you with Term insurance or big investment plans. Less / no support from Bank representatives. Disappointed but still had hope so called up voice customer care, the guy was quick enough to give a toll free helpline number which turned out to be for Securities only. After 3 years with SC, this is the first time I think about moving my account to another one. Investing in Mutual Fund via SC seems be a dream now. 

It seem they have invested all their money in Anushka Sharma‚Äôs ad campaign instead of customer support. 

Pathetic!!!

Title: PDF Format is NA for downloading E-statement
Review:
Hi Team,

We should have options to E- statements in pdf format too apart from excel and txt format. Add this option in website, I assume we can‚Äôt download any statements in app.

Please improve this feature in next update.

Thanks & Regards,
SCB user

Title: Update made it slow
Review: I really love the look of the new app but it is extremely slow now. It takes time to load every single page.

Title: Great banking app
Review: The new update actually made me come here and review it. The dynamic wallpaper is a stunning addition to the app. Makes it beautiful and different. The app itself is very good because you can add payees or delete them without having to login to your online banking on your laptop. The debit and credit information are very neat as compared to other bank apps like citibank. Good job guys! Keep it up!

Title: App doesn‚Äôt even work
Review: You can‚Äôt even login. It says temporary out of service

Title: Awesome exterior , sore interior
Review:
Last time I wrote the review , I had mentioned how bad the app features were and that other local banks had better apps. 

Now with this update , they have increased the oomph factor but still app needs better packaging. Still face the issue with OTP entering and once you enter the app, same old problems exist. 

Better spend on required things rather than painting the exteriors with colours.

Title: Love the new update!
Review:
Starting with the user interface , it looks amazing! The app has got smoother and couple of new features like instant balance check. Which I think is necessary. 
5 stars *****

Title: Nice Update !!
Review:
Finally a nice update in terms of UI and Functionality.
Some home we are saved from the login error.
General exception.
Way to go !!

Title: App fails to login with Face ID
Review: Application fails to log us through Face ID keeps getting error message

Title: Great update!
Review:
The new update takes the app to a different level! 

The look is neat, crisp and pleaaing. The basic functionality of the app, signing in, checking balances and other such functions are buttery smooth and easy to access. Once I have used the other functions, i'll know how good the app has become; but looking at how everything is so far, I am very happy! Kudos to the team!

Title: Good app, Face ID missing though
Review: This is a good enough app for tracking your account/s, been using it for a long time. Touch ID was too convenient a feature on previous generations. Although addition of Face ID would be a great addition in the features list.

1. Introduce UPI Transfer in the app.

2. While making a transaction it is asking for OTP, but the OTP box would be in the top and submit will be in bottom. Why can't you change the OTP entering box to bottom near submit button.
3.An option to change ATM pin
4. An option to Change personal details like phone number, address.

Title: Finally, the most awaited feature is added..
Review:
It was a shame that the app did not support the possibility to add a new payee on the go. 

Good work in finally bringing up this feature. It works seamlessly and the interface is beautiful and flowing as always. 

Still not giving it a "5-star rating" because there is no option to remove existing payees. 

On the whole, still a good app with a clean UI.!!

Title: Not good for credit card users
Review: It's has very less features for credit card. All focus on bank account. You will have to add some more features for credit card. Your credit card is too popular but you don't have something new for credit card apps. Tnx

Title: Useless and totally unreliable app
Review: It takes weeks for the credit card transactions to appear in the app.

Title: Worst App
Review: The transaction on credit card is displayed from day one. It's confusing what is been used for the current bill cycle.

Title: Touch ID - need more security
Review:
Good option, implemented without sufficient thinking.
We all feel that cellphone is personal but not entirely true. Many will share cell passwords with family and have Touch ID configured for spouse and in many cases for kids for various reasons. Enabling all touchid access to all touchid is a security and safety concern.
If you link it to one specific fingerprint, it makes more sense.
Till then, this is fancy option and may be used by few but not an option for many more.

Title: No.1 app for banking sector
Review: Trending app for ithrt newtworks

Review: It lacks features, not even moderately good enough. RTGS,NEFT, IMPS and many more plus you can't add a beneficiary. Only visa money transfer is available, there is a lot more. These are the basic functionalities provided by other banking apps.
